Room.Name: Panthor Academy of Fighting Arts
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the Academy of Fighting Arts, where aspiring Fighters go during their early years to train in the intelligent art of fighting.
Room.LongDescription: Fighting is not all brute strength, and a good fighter must realize this. In order to advance in levels as a fighter, you must first defeat an equally capable fighter one level higher than you. If you are a veteran aspiring to advance to second class, you should enter the red door. If you are already a Veteran, second class, you should enter the blue door.
